name: The Deer Bow Hunting-Real Jungle Archery challenge
name_original: The Deer Bow Hunting-Real Jungle Archery challenge
description:
Step into the wild era of deer chasing of your next hunting adventure. Start the wild hunter journey to the mountain forests while manage your expert huntsman skills in this chase and run play.


Equipped with wild hunter skills you have got the chance to enjoy hunting while deer chasing in medieval style. Time to live the dream of becoming a medieval hunter knight chasing for its target. Stalk and hunt deer around forest while using your best archery techniques.


Stretch the bow and shoot the arrow like wild hunter!


- Make one realistic shoot to hit on target

- Rule the physics of bow and arrow archery

- Try bow hunting tricks in a natural hunter way


Providing you best bow and arrow shooting ground, urge your horse to gain speed on deer chasing. Riding on a victor trained horse emerge as a wild hunter of all ages. Chasing deer in pursuit of fast hunt before they lost in lush lands.

Deer are large in number but veiled inside the green valley forests, they are lively and alert too and may not give another chance to get shoot. Finally put on test your sharp eye huntsman hawk to hit on your prey with a single shoot only.



Deer Chasing: Wild Hunter 3D Features

> 3D shooting and hunting feel environment

> Outsized deer chasing to hunt

> Pure bow and arrow swing release physics
